action_details: For this emergency, we will deploy 5 Engine Companies (15 firefighters) to combat the fire, 2 Truck Companies (6 firefighters) for aerial support and rescue operations, 1 Rescue Company (4 firefighters) for medical assistance, and 2 Safety Personnel (2 firefighters) for crowd control and incident command. The estimated severity of the fire is high due to its location in a residential area with multiple story buildings and potential for rapid spread. Given the injured people reported, we will prioritize medical attention alongside firefighting efforts. We will also assign an additional team of 3 firefighters to provide backup and relief.
